original: intros H0. apply is_lim_seq_p_infty_Reals. unfold cv_infty. intros M. assert (0 < M / 2) as H1 by lra. apply (Pow_x_infinity q (M / 2)) in H0 as [N HN]. - exists N. intros n Hn. specialize (HN n Hn). replace (M) with (M / 2 + M / 2) by lra. apply Rlt_gt. eapply Rlt_le_trans. ++ apply Rplus_lt_compat_r. apply HN. ++ specialize (HN n Hn). simpl. lra. - lra.
